text: "Only When I Sleep" is a 1997 song by Irish band The Corrs and is the leading single from their second studio album Talk on Corners. It went to number 58 in the United Kingdom, number 47 in Scotland, number 10 in Ireland, number 1 in Spain and number 34 in Australia. ==Track listings== * UK and Japanese CD single # "Only When I Sleep" (radio edit) – 3:50 # "Only When I Sleep" (LP version) – 4:23 # "Remember" – 4:02 # "Only When I Sleep" (instrumental) – 4:23 * UK cassette single # "Only When I Sleep" (radio edit) – 3:50 # "Remember" – 4:02 * French and Benelux CD single # "Only When I Sleep" (radio edit) – 3:50 # "Only When I Sleep" (LP version) – 4:23 # "Only When I Sleep" (instrumental) – 4:23 ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:The Corrs songs
